title: Sampler, 1721
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in two-sided cross, half cross, tent, eyelet, back, satin, and double running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Scattered motifs of religion and hunting.

Sampler, 1721.
1721. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in two-sided cross, half cross, tent, eyelet, back, satin, and double running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-270.
